pkgmetadata.longdescription: # NQDMA more generalised implementation to TQDM-progress bars, which simulates a single loop for multiple loops and returns multiple elements at the same time. It can iterate over the deeper levels. It is compatible with many data types, is customizable and beginner-friendly.### InstallingInstall it using the terminal```pip install nqdm```Then import it as follows```from nqdm import nqdm```## Get StartedPlease check *main.ipynb* for use cases ## Built With* [tqdm](https://github.com/tqdm/tqdm) - The progress bar## Authors* **Yamac Eren Ay** - *Initial work* - [yamaceay](https://github.com/yamaceay)## LicenseThis project is licensed under the MIT License - see the [LICENSE.md](LICENSE.md) file for details## Special Thanks to:* **Stanislav Kosorin** - [stano45](https://github.com/stano45) * **Ori Toledo** - *Logo design* - [oritoledo](https://github.com/oritoledo)## AcknowledgmentsIt's worth mentioning that this module is built on top of [TQDM](https://tqdm.github.io/), I would like tothank them for making this process of creating progress bars easy and flexible.
